name: Almericus - Scarred Islands
description:
Almericus Scarred Islands is a top down interactive & story-driven RPG game on PC made with GMS2. I worked on this project on my spare time for years so there is a lot of cool and fun elements to it. 

The plot is a dark fantastic adventure where you play as an intriguing pirate with special powers that travel around the world under attack by demons.  The game is not completed  but there is a decent amount of content for whoever wants to have fun. 

You can follow me on twitter for anything about the game. Feel free to comment and ask any questions!

https://mobile.twitter.com/almericusdev
